detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide neckline, elastication and a broderie anglaise flounce at the top, and a smocked hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric. Crêpe top with a zip at the back and pleated skirt. Lined.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Shorts in sturdy denim. High waist with wide elastication, a frill trim at the top and detachable tie belt, and pockets in the side seams.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back. Flounce woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise around the neckline.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Straight-cut, calf-length dress in soft pima cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Large hair claw in marbled plastic with rhinestones. Width 9.5 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Dress in softly draping jersey crêpe with a gathered seam at the front, extra-long sleeves and wide cuffs with a covered button. Heavily draping balloon skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Large clutch bag in faux fur with leather details, a snap lock at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 17x38 cm.

Kaftan in an airy jacquard weave made partly from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. V-neck, a decorative knot detail below the bust, short sleeves with wide turn-ups, and an asymmetric hem.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

Short-sleeved playsuit in soft jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a wrapover top and horizontal ties at the back. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hems.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch. One with an all-over print and two ribbed.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in a fine-knit with long raglan sleeves.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in woven fabric with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems with a frill trim.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, narrow sides, high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short dress in an airy, crinkled weave with a frill-trimmed collar with embroidery, and a button placket. Long puff sleeves with frill-trimmed, embroidered, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist. Jersey underdress.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Cycling shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back. Long sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a cut-out section at one side and a high cut at the back.
Sandals in imitation leather with adjustable straps, moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a decorative tie-detail at the hem.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a motif with terry letters on the front.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, and narrow shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Wide elastication at the hem.
Sleeveless playsuit in printed cotton jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and small frill trim at the hems.

Fine-knit hooded top in a soft, marled viscose blend with a print motif, wide ribbing around the hood, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Skirt in patterned, washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and a flounce at the hem.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Trainers with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide elastic waistband. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.
Straight T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front. Round neck with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short dungaree dress in washed denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps with a metal fastener at the front. Front and back pockets, buttons at the sides, a fake fly and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
V-neck blouse in a gently draping viscose weave with buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam and flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Short, A-line skirt woven in an airy cotton blend with embroidery. Elasticated waist and a layer of tulle underneath to create extra volume. Inner skirt woven in a cotton blend.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Playsuit in chiffon made from recycled polyester with covered buttons at the front, a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Seam under the bust and at the waist. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in soft, ribbed jersey with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons at the front, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and straight, wide, calf-length legs.
Long-sleeved top in waffled jersey with ribbed cuffs.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in soft cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey.
Short, wide shorts in a crinkled weave with a high waist with pleats and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Lightly padded gilet in functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, ventilating side panels in sturdy jersey and side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined.
Short, fitted jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long sleeves and a motif on the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a roll-edge neckline, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Jumper with a round neck and long sleeves. Wide trousers with an elasticated waist and decorative grosgrain bow.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with lapped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed trim around the neckline. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Temporary tattoos in different sizes.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
